attributes.action: Have the London eye fitted with spokey dokeys.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In these times of uncertainty the government should be looking for ways to raise morale throughout this great nation.
The London eye is now one of the capitals most iconic landmarks; we feel that it would be vastly improved by the addition of the spokey dokey. 
The much loved wheel accessory would add an air of fun with bright colours and the ever so familiar happy clinking sound would give the nation hope for the future.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
